snippet: Another goal for Riyad Mahrez. Another victory for Leicester in its bid to become the English Premier League's most unlikely champion....

headline.main: Mahrez Magic Puts Leicester 5 Points Clear in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Mahrez Magic Puts Leicester 5 Points Clear in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Another goal for Riyad Mahrez. Another victory for Leicester in its bid to become the English Premier League's most unlikely champion.

snippet: Emmanuel Adebayor has joined his fourth Premier League team after signing for Crystal Palace, the club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Crystal Palace Bring Adebayor Back to Premier League
headline.print_headline: Crystal Palace Bring Adebayor Back to Premier League

lead_paragraph: Emmanuel Adebayor has joined his fourth Premier League team after signing for Crystal Palace, the club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Celtic effectively wrapped up the Scottish Premier League title with a 3-1 win at Hearts on Saturday that left them nine points clear of Aberdeen with three games left....

headline.main: Celtic All but Clinch Scottish Premier League Title
headline.print_headline: Celtic All but Clinch Scottish Premier League Title

lead_paragraph: Celtic effectively wrapped up the Scottish Premier League title with a 3-1 win at Hearts on Saturday that left them nine points clear of Aberdeen with three games left.

snippet: Attacking midfielder Fabio Borini said he was confident Sunderland will be playing in the Premier League next season after their 3-0 win over Norwich City, who are also fighting relegation....

headline.main: Borini Sure Sunderland Will Stay in Premier League Next Season
headline.print_headline: Borini Sure Sunderland Will Stay in Premier League Next Season

lead_paragraph: Attacking midfielder Fabio Borini said he was confident Sunderland will be playing in the Premier League next season after their 3-0 win over Norwich City, who are also fighting relegation.

snippet: One coach will be wearing a baseball cap, tracksuit and sneakers. The other is usually sharply dressed in a suit, tie and shoes....

headline.main: Culture Clash: It's Pulis vs. Guardiola in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Culture Clash: It's Pulis vs. Guardiola in Premier League

lead_paragraph: One coach will be wearing a baseball cap, tracksuit and sneakers. The other is usually sharply dressed in a suit, tie and shoes.

snippet: Leicester failed to reproduce its Champions League form in drawing 0-0 at home to Southampton in another disappointing result in its title defense Sunday....

headline.main: Leicester Draws 0-0 With Southampton in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Leicester Draws 0-0 With Southampton in Premier League

lead_paragraph: Leicester failed to reproduce its Champions League form in drawing 0-0 at home to Southampton in another disappointing result in its title defense Sunday.

snippet: Swansea says the Premier League has approved a deal for American investors to take control of the south Wales club....

headline.main: Premier League Backs US Investors to Take Control of Swansea
headline.print_headline: Premier League Backs US Investors to Take Control of Swansea

lead_paragraph: Swansea says the Premier League has approved a deal for American investors to take control of the south Wales club.

snippet: Leicester City's England striker Jamie Vardy has been named Premier League Player of the Season after his pivotal role in the club's remarkable title-winning campaign....

headline.main: Leicester's Vardy Named Premier League Player of the Season
headline.print_headline: Leicester's Vardy Named Premier League Player of the Season

lead_paragraph: Leicester City's England striker Jamie Vardy has been named Premier League Player of the Season after his pivotal role in the club's remarkable title-winning campaign.

snippet: Burnley's charge back towards the Premier League was checked on Saturday when a late goal from Danny Batth earned Wolverhampton Wanderers a 1-1 draw at Turf Moor....

headline.main: Burnley's Charge Towards Premier League Interrupted by Batth
headline.print_headline: Burnley's Charge Towards Premier League Interrupted by Batth

lead_paragraph: Burnley's charge back towards the Premier League was checked on Saturday when a late goal from Danny Batth earned Wolverhampton Wanderers a 1-1 draw at Turf Moor.

snippet: Striker Odion Ighalo was named the Premier League's player of the month for December and Quique Sanchez Flores bagged the managerial award to give Watford a notable double....

headline.main: Watford Double Up in Monthly Premier League Awards
headline.print_headline: Watford Double Up in Monthly Premier League Awards

lead_paragraph: Striker Odion Ighalo was named the Premier League's player of the month for December and Quique Sanchez Flores bagged the managerial award to give Watford a notable double.
